title: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Gu Guguai Jie You Guguai

alternative_titles.ja: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之古古怪界有古怪

synopsis:
The anion and cation orbs were stolen by a mysterious wolf pack, pointing the finger of danger directly at the Strange Realm. The sheep and wolves tracked them down to the Strange Realm, only to discover that Handsome Guy and Black General had also been captured and taken to the Inner Earth beneath it. To rescue the two eggs, the sheep and wolves resolutely set off for the Inner Earth. In their adventures through the layers of the Inner Earth, the sheep and wolves met various explorers, fought against unknown monsters, and braved mysterious dangers. After countless battles and intrigues, the sheep and wolves finally uncovered the conspiracy of the ruthless preserved egg factory, rescued Handsome Guy and Black General, and, with the help of the two eggs, thwarted the crisis caused by the wolf pack, protecting the peace of the Inner Earth.

(Source: iQIYI, translated)
